item.title: PHYS105-lecture-20200430
item.description: Announcements # Today # Clickers # Remember temperature is the average kinetic energy of the system. Discussion # Note: Ability to derive this next part isn’t included in the test. Look at a box with one particle: Now lets add a lot more particles: These don’t need to be derived, but understood. Will be useful on the next exam. The degree of freedom is the “number of boxes” you can divide the energy into.
